alert.note: Alert for Mt. Hood National Forest - West of Cascade Crest; Willamette National Forest (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 09 at 7:50PM PDT until August 10 at 6:00AM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...SCATTERED THUNDERSTORMS WITH ABUNDANT LIGHTNING EXPECTED THIS EVENING ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE CASCADES...CASCADE FOOTHILLS...WILLAMETTE VALLEY AND NORTHERN EAST SLOPES OF THE COAST RANGE... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PDT WEDNESDAY FOR THUNDERSTORMS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 607 AND 608... * AFFECTED AREA...In Oregon, Fire Weather Zone 607 Mt. Hood National Forest West of Cascade Crest and Fire Weather Zone 608 Willamette National Forest. * THUNDERSTORMS...3 (A chance of thunderstorms). * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusty erratic wind gusts up to 35 mph will be possible with the strongest storms. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning and critically dry fuels may result in numerous fire starts. Thunderstorm outflow winds may result in erratic fire spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of the above conditions can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Mt. Hood National Forest - West of Cascade Crest; Willamette National Forest
